private.description: Drag and drop your Kindle clippings file to share your favorite passages

on.title: Private Mode
on.description: Your clippings will be visible only to you

off.title: Public Mode
off.description: Your clippings will be shared with the community

file.hint: Your file will be processed automatically when dropped here

tips.wait: Please wait while we process your clippings

help.title: Need Help?
help.how_to_title: How to export your Kindle clippings
help.how_to_description: Connect your Kindle to computer via USB, and find the "My Clippings.txt" file in Documents folder.
